org.transitime.db.structs

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Route
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    For storing in db information for a route. Based on GTFS information from routes.txt and other files.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
